summary: Mixin providing shared test utilities and test cases for TensorFlow Retrievalâ€‘Augmented Generation (RAG) models, including tokenizer helpers, retriever setup, and verification of generation behavior across different configurations such as custom document counts, encoder outputs, and presence or absence of a retriever.
